Text: The Ottoman Military College or Imperial Military Staff College or Ottoman Army War College (Ottoman Turkish: "Mekteb-i Erkân-ı Harbiyye-i Şâhâne"‎ or "Erkân-ı Harbiye Mektebi"), was a two-year military staff college of the Ottoman Empire.
Triplets:<The Ottoman Military College

Text: Ottoman Military College:  It was located in Istanbul.
